channel.title: Psychonauts!
channel.description:
I've seen a few people on these forums state their fondness for Psychonauts in the past, so thought I'd advertise the fact Steam's version of Psychonauts has just been updated to include Achievements, and they've made some sort of modification to the Meat Circus (exactly what, I'm as yet unsure of!)
[url=https://kotaku.com/5845201/wow-psychonauts-just-got-a-big-update-achievements-and-a-mac-version]Read all about it![/url]

item.title: Psychonauts!
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
Jokerine:

Moar liek clairvoyance, the reddish badge with the eyes.

Yeah, but I remember there being an item you had to buy. I’m thinking it was the cobweb duster. But I really don’t remember. And yeah clairvoyance on the crows.

Read full topic

item.description:
I started replaying it today because of this. Good times to be had

Read full topic

item.title: Psychonauts!
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Yup, that fight was pretty annoying. I managed to get past the Napoleon level but I had to consult a guide because I had no idea how to get back to normal size after being shrunk at first because the game didn’t explain that.

At any rate, I’ll have to get around to finishing that game.

Read full topic

I think you need telekinesis or something to get through it, and if you don’t have it then… well, shit.

Moar liek clairvoyance, the reddish badge with the eyes.

item.title: Psychonauts!
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
soopadood:

i loved that game, took me forever to finish, but The milk man conspiracy is an unforgettable level

The first time I went through that level I resorted to smashing my controller. I think you need telekinesis or something to get through it, and if you don’t have it then… well, shit.

item.title: Psychonauts!

item.description:
Psychonauts is one of those games that I bought because it went on sale for ridiculously little money and then never got around to playing. I’m sure I’ll get to it eventually.

item.title: Psychonauts!
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
Article:

“We are really excited,” said Double Fine president Tim Schafer in a press release, “to finally be answering fans’ requests for a more difficult Meat Circus.” And by “more difficult,” he actually means “less difficult.”

This is such bullcrap. I loved Meat Circus and found it pretty easy at level 98 - leveled up to 100 there. I honestly did not understand what people were whining about.

Achievements, on the other hand… COME TO PAPA.

Read full topic
